title: About Hong Kong Python User Group
description: Hong Kong Python User Group (HKPUG) is a community-driven group of Python enthusiasts in Hong Kong. We organize regular meetups, workshops, and other events to promote Python programming language and its applications in various domains such as web development, data science, machine learning, and more.
mission: Our mission is to foster a vibrant and inclusive Python community in Hong Kong, providing opportunities for learning, networking, and collaboration.
